price: 51. Markaan u nicmeyno Aadmiga, wuu jeesadaa oo dhinac u baxaa, markuuse dhib taabto, wuu baryootan badan yahay.
arabic: وَإِذَآ أَنۡعَمۡنَا عَلَى ٱلۡإِنسَٰنِ أَعۡرَضَ وَنَـَٔا بِجَانِبِهِۦ وَإِذَا مَسَّهُ ٱلشَّرُّ فَذُو دُعَآءٍ عَرِيضٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā anʿamnā ʿalā al-insāni aʿraḍa wanaā bijānibihi wa-idhā massahu al-sharu fadhū duʿāin ʿarīḍin
